101.name: The First Attempt at Fleet Organization!
101.desc: Have 2 ships in your main fleet.

102.name: Form a Destroyer Division!
102.desc: Have 4 DD in your main fleet.

103.name: Form a Torpedo Squadron!
103.desc: Have a CL as a flagship and 5 DD in your main fleet.

104.name: Form a Six-Ship Fleet Formation!
104.memo: ➣Rewards the Second Fleet and Expeditions Tab

105.name: Form a Division with Two Light Cruisers!
105.desc: Have 2 CL in your main fleet.

106.name: Form a Heavy Cruiser Division!
106.desc: Have 2 CA (not CAV) in your main fleet.

107.name: Form a Carrier Task Force!
107.desc: Have a CV(L) as flagship and 3 DD in your main fleet.

108.name: Arrange Both of the Tenryuu-class Light Cruiser Sisters!
108.desc: Have Tenryuu and Tatsuta in your main fleet.

109.name: Arrange the Three Sendai-class Light Cruiser Sisters!
109.desc: Have Sendai, Jintsuu and Naka in your main fleet.

110.name: Arrange the Four Myoukou-class Heavy Cruiser Sisters!
110.desc: Have Myoukou, Nachi, Ashigara and Haguro in your main fleet.

111.name: Arrange Both of the Fusou-class Battleship Sisters!
111.desc: Have Fusou and Yamashiro in your main fleet.

112.name: Arrange Both of the Ise-class Battleship Sisters!
112.desc: Have Ise and Hyuuga in your main fleet.

113.name: Form a Main Fleet with a Battleship and Heavy Cruisers!
113.desc: Have a BB (not BBV) and 2 CA in your main fleet.

114.name: Form the Nagumo Task Force!
114.desc: Have ONLY Akagi, Kaga, Hiryuu and Souryuu in your main fleet.

115.name: Form the Second Fleet!
115.desc: Have a ship in your second fleet.

116.name: Deploy a Seaplane Tender!
116.desc: Have an AV in your main fleet.

117.name: Form a Carrier Task Force in the Second Fleet!
117.desc: Have a CV(L) and 3 DD in your second fleet.

118.name: Arrange the Kongou-class Fast Battleship Forces!
118.desc: Have Kongou, Hiei, Haruna and Kirishima in your main fleet.

119.name: Form the Mikawa Fleet!
119.desc: Have Choukai, Aoba, Kako, Furutaka, Tenryuu and a FAST ship in your main fleet.

120.name: Form the 6th Destroyer Division!
120.desc: Have ONLY Akatsuki, Hibiki, Inazuma and Ikazuchi in your fleet.

121.name: Form the 4th Cruiser Division!
121.desc: Have Atago, Takao, Choukai and Maya in your main fleet.

122.name: Form the Nishimura Fleet!
122.desc: Have Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami and Shigure in your main fleet.

123.name: Form the 5th Carrier Division!
123.desc: Have Shoukaku, Zuikaku and 2 DD in your main fleet.

124.name: Form the New Mikawa Fleet!
124.desc: Have Choukai, Aoba, Kinugasa, Kako, Furutaka and Tenryuu in your main fleet.

126.name: Form an Aviation Surface Attack Fleet!
126.desc: Have 2 BBV and 2 CAV in your main fleet.

128.name: Form the 6th Cruiser Division!
128.desc: Have Furutaka, Kako, Aoba and Kinugasa in your main fleet.

129.name: Form the 5th Fleet!
129.desc: Have Nachi, Ashigara, Tama and Kiso in your fleet.

130.name: Form the 1st Torpedo Squadron!
130.desc: Have Abukuma, Akebono, Ushio, Kasumi and Shiranui in your fleet.

131.name: Form the 8th Destroyer Division!
131.desc: Have ONLY Asashio, Michishio, Ooshio and Arashio in your fleet.

132.name: Form the 18th Destroyer Division!
132.desc: Have ONLY Kasumi, Arare, Kagerou and Shiranui in your fleet.

133.name: Form the 30th Destroyer Division (First Generation)!
133.desc: Have ONLY Mutsuki, Kisaragi, Yayoi and Mochizuki in your fleet.

134.name: Preparation for the Ceremony! (Part 3)
134.desc: Collect your feelings and form a fleet with a Lv.90~99 flagship!

135.name: A New Voyage!
135.desc: Form a fleet with your newlywed Lv.100+ ship as flagship and 5 additional ships!

136.name: Form the 30th Destroyer Division (Second Generation)!
136.desc: Have ONLY Mutsuki, Yayoi, Uzuki and Mochizuki in your fleet.

137.name: Form the 5th Cruiser Division!
137.desc: Have Myoukou, Nachi and Haguro in your fleet.

138.name: Form the New 2nd Carrier Division!
138.desc: Have Hiryuu Kai Ni as flagship, Souryuu and 2 DD in your fleet.

139.name: Form the 6th Submarine Fleet!
139.desc: Have 1 AS and 4 SS(V) in your fleet.

140.name: Deploy the New Type of Radar!
140.desc: Have Myoukou Kai Ni as flagship of your fleet.

141.name: Strengthen the Reformed 2nd Carrier Division!
141.desc: Have Souryuu Kai Ni as flagship, Hiryuu Kai Ni, and 2 DD in your fleet.

142.name: Amass All Ships of the Elite 3rd Battleship Division!
142.desc: Have Kongou Kai Ni, Haruna Kai Ni, Kirishima Kai Ni and Hiei Kai Ni in your main fleet.

143.name: Deploy a New Model of Standard Aircraft Carrier!
143.desc: Have Unryuu as flagship of your main fleet.

144.name: Form the Main Battleship Force, 2nd Division!
144.desc: Have ONLY Nagato, Mutsu, Fusou and Yamashiro in your main fleet.

145.name: Arrange the Primary Battleships of the Surface Task Force!
145.desc: Have 3 BB (Nagato-class, Fusou-class, Ise-cass or Yamato-class ONLY) and 1 CL in your fleet.

146.name: Prepare the Improvement Arsenal!
146.desc: Have Akashi as flagship of your main fleet.

147.name: Reform the Nishimura Fleet!
147.desc: Have Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, Shigure and Michishio in your main fleet.

148.name: Form a Light Surface Counterattack Force!
148.desc: Have Kasumi as flagship, Ashigara, 1 CL and 3 DD in your main fleet.

149.name: Form the 11th Destroyer Division!
149.desc: Have ONLY Fubuki, Shirayuki, Hatsuyuki and Murakumo in your main fleet.

150.name: Form the 21st Destroyer Division!
150.desc: Have ONLY Hatsuharu, Nenohi, Wakaba and Hatsushimo in your main fleet.

151.name: Form the 22nd Destroyer Division!
151.desc: Have ONLY Satsuki, Fumizuki, Nagatsuki and 1 DD in your main fleet.

152.name: Prepare the New Mikawa Fleet to Break Through!
152.desc: Have Choukai Kai Ni as flagship and any five of Aoba, Kinugasa, Kako, Furutaka, Tenryuu, Yuubari in your main fleet.

153.name: Reform the 18th Cruiser Division!
153.desc: Have Tenryuu, Tatsuta and at least 2 additional ships in your fleet.

154.name: Form the Surface Breakthrough Force!
154.desc: Have Hiei, Kirishima, Nagara, Akatsuki, Ikazuchi and Inazuma in your fleet.

155.name: Form the New 6th Destroyer Division!
155.desc: Have ONLY Akatsuki Kai Ni as flagship, Hibiki/Verniy, Ikazuchi and Inazuma in your fleet.

156.name: Prepare the 1st Torpedo Squadron to Break Through into the North!
156.desc: Have Abukuma as flagship, Hibiki/Verniy, Hatsushimo, Wakaba, Samidare and Shimakaze in your main fleet.

157.name: Prepare DesRon 1 to Break Through into the North Again!
157.desc: Have Abukuma Kai Ni as flagship, Hibiki/Verniy, Yuugumo, Naganami, Akigumo and Shimakaze in your main fleet.

161.name: Reform the 5th Carrier Division!
161.desc: Have Shoukaku, Zuikaku, Oboro and Akigumo in your main fleet.

162.name: Prepare to Sortie the New 21st Cruiser Division!
162.desc: Have Nachi Kai Ni, Ashigara Kai Ni, Tama and Kiso in your main fleet.

163.name: Form the 16th Cruiser Division (First Generation)!
163.desc: Have Ashigara as flagship, Kuma and Nagara in your main fleet.

164.name: Form the 3rd Carrier Division!
164.desc: Have Zuikaku Kai as flagship, Zuihou, Chitose (CVL) and Chiyoda (CVL) in your main fleet.

165.name: Form the 4th Carrier Division!
165.desc: Have Ise Kai and Hyuuga Kai in your main fleet.
165.memo: ➣Rewards 2 Screws and a Zuiun (634 Air Group)

166.name: Form the Ozawa Fleet!
166.desc: Have Zuikaku Kai as flagship, Zuihou Kai, Chitose (CVL), Chiyoda (CVL), Ise Kai and Hyuuga Kai in your main fleet.

167.name: Form the New Carrier Division!
167.desc: Have Zuikaku Kai Ni, Shoukaku Kai Ni and 2 DD in your fleet.

168.name: Form the 16th Cruiser Division (Second Generation)
168.desc: Have Natori as flagship, Isuzu and Kinu in your fleet.

169.name: Form the Newly Organized Carrier Division!
169.desc: Have 2 CV(L), 2 BBV/CAV and 2 DD in your fleet.

170.name: Reform the Strengthened Surface Counterattack Force!
170.desc: Have Kasumi as flagship, Ashigara, Ooyodo, Asashimo and Kiyoshimo in your fleet.

171.name: Form the 31st Cruiser Division (First Generation)!
171.desc: Have Isuzu Kai Ni as flagship, Satsuki Kai Ni and Uzuki Kai in your fleet.

172.name: Form the 27th Destroyer Division!
172.desc: Have ONLY Shiratsuyu Kai as flagship, Shigure, Harusame and Samidare in your fleet.

173.name: Form a Forced High-Speed Transport Force!
173.desc: Have Sendai Kai Ni as flagship, Kawakaze Kai Ni, Shigure Kai Ni and 2 DD in your fleet.

174.name: Reform the Fleet Composition Into a New Torpedo Squadron!
174.desc: Have a CL/CLT/CT as the flagship and 4 DD in any fleet.

175.name: Reform the New 8th Destroyer Division!
175.desc: Have ONLY Asashio Kai Ni (or Kai Ni D) as flagship, Michishio, Ooshio and Arashio in your fleet.
175.memo: ✘If you meet the conditions and it doesn't clear, switch the quest off and turn it on again.

176.name: Elite! DesDiv 8, 1st platoon!
176.desc: Have Asashio Kai Ni D and Ooshio Kai Ni in your fleet.
176.memo:
✘If you meet the conditions and it doesn't clear, switch the quest off and turn it on again.
➣Rewards 3 Screws

177.name: Form the 19th Destroyer Division!
177.desc: Have Isonami, Uranami, Ayanami and Shikinami in your fleet.

178.name: Form the 16th Cruiser Division (Third Generation)!
178.desc: Have Kinu, Aoba, Kitakami and Ooi in your fleet.

179.name: Reform the Elite 16th Cruiser Division!
179.desc: Have Kinu Kai Ni as flagship and any five of Kitakami Kai Ni, Ooi Kai Ni, Kuma Kai, Aoba Kai, Uranami Kai and Shikinami Kai in your fleet.

203.name: Guard the Sea in Front of the Naval Base!
203.desc: Sortie to [W1-1]. B-Rank+ the boss node.

204.name: Sortie into the Nansei Islands Region!
204.desc: Sortie to [W1-2]. Reach the end of the map.

205.name: Intercept the Approaching Enemy Vanguard Fleet!
205.desc: Sortie to [W1-2]. B-Rank+ the boss node.

206.name: Sortie a Torpedo Squadron!
206.desc: Sortie a CL as flagship and 3 DD to any map.

207.name: Sortie a Heavy Cruiser!
207.desc: Sortie a CA as flagship to any map.

208.name: Sortie a Battleship!
208.desc: Sortie a BB flagship to any map. A BBV will not count.

209.name: Sortie a Carrier Task Force!
209.desc: Sortie a CV(L) flagship and 5 DD/CL/AV to any map.

215.name: Second Fleet, Sortie!
215.desc: Sortie your 2nd Fleet to any map. A sortie, not an expedition.

219.name: Sortie the Mikawa Fleet!
219.desc: Sortie Choukai, Aoba, Kako, Furutaka, Tenryuu and 1 additional FAST ship to any map.

222.name: Sortie the 6th Destroyer Division!
222.desc: Sortie ONLY Akatsuki, Hibiki, Inazuma and Ikazuchi to any map.

223.name: Sortie the 4th Cruiser Division!
223.desc: Sortie Atago, Takao, Choukai, Maya and 2 additional ships to [W2-2]. B-Rank+ the boss node.

224.name: Sortie the Nishimura Fleet!
224.desc: Sortie Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, Shigure and 2 additional ships to [W2-3]. B-Rank+ the boss node.

225.name: Sortie the 5th Carrier Division!
225.desc: Sortie Shoukaku, Zuikaku and 4 additional ships to [W3-1]. B-Rank+ the boss node.

227.name: Sortie the New Mikawa Fleet!
227.desc: Sortie Choukai, Aoba, Kinugasa, Kako, Furutaka and Tenryuu to [W2-3]. B-Rank+ the boss node.

231.name: Sortie a Submarine Fleet!
231.desc: Sortie 2 SS and 4 additional ships to [W2-3]. B-Rank+ the boss node.

232.name: Sortie an Aviation Surface Attack Fleet!
232.desc: Sortie 2 BBV, 2 CAV and 2 additional ships to [W4-2]. B-Rank+ the boss node.

233.name: Sortie the 6th Cruiser Division!
233.desc: Sortie Furutaka, Kako, Kinugasa, Aoba and 2 additional ships to [W2-3]. S-Rank the boss node.

239.name: Sortie the 8th Destroyer Division!
239.desc: Sortie Asashio, Michishio, Ooshio, Arashio and 2 additional ships to [W2-3]. B-Rank+ the boss node.

240.name: Sortie the 18th Destroyer Division!
240.desc: Sortie Kasumi, Arare, Kagerou, Shiranui and 2 additional ships to [W3-1]. B-Rank+ the boss node.

244.name: Sortie the 30th Destroyer Division (First Generation)!
244.desc: Sortie Mutsuki, Kisaragi, Yayoi, Mochizuki and up to 2 additional ships to [W3-2]. C-Rank+ the boss node.

245.name: Preparation for the Ceremony! (Finale)
245.desc: Sortie a Lv.90-99 flagship to [W2-3]. S-Rank the boss node.

246.name: A Couple's First Mission!
246.desc: Sortie a Lv.100+ flagship to [W4-3]. S-Rank the boss node.

247.name: The Aviation Battleships Set Sail!
247.desc: Sortie 2 BBV and up to 4 additional ships to [W4-4]. B-Rank+ the boss node.

248.name: The 30th Destroyer Fleet's Anti-Submarine Patrol
248.desc: Sortie Mutsuki, Yayoi, Uzuki and Mochizuki to [W1-5]. C-Rank+ the boss node.

250.name: Sortie the New 2nd Carrier Division
250.desc: Sortie Hiryuu Kai Ni as flagship, Souryuu, 2 DD and up to 2 additional ships to [W5-2]. S-Rank the boss node.

251.name: The Elite 2nd Carrier Division Sets Sail!
251.desc: Sortie Souryuu Kai Ni as flagship, Hiryuu Kai Ni, 2 DD and up to 2 additional ships to [W4-3]. S-Rank the boss node.

252.name: Sortie the Battleship Haruna!
252.desc: Sortie Haruna Kai Ni as flagship and 5 additional ships to [W5-1]. S-Rank the boss node.

253.name: Sortie the 601st Naval Air Group!
253.desc: Sortie Unryuu Kai as flagship and 5 additional ships to [W5-2]. S-Rank the boss node.
253.memo: ➣Rewards a Skilled Carrier-based Aircraft Maintenance Personnel

254.name: Sortie a Light Aircraft Carrier Division!
254.desc: Sortie 1-2 CVL, 1 CL and 3-4 DD to [W2-1]. S-Rank the boss node.

255.name: Emergency Deployment of a Torpedo Squadron!
255.desc: Sortie a CL as flagship and either (1 CL and 4 DD) or (5 DD) to [W2-2]. S-Rank the boss node.
255.memo:
※Emergency Deployment of a Torpedo Squadron into the Bashi Islands Region!
➣Rewards a Furniture Fairy

258.name: The 2nd Battleship Division Sets Sail!
258.desc: Sortie Nagato, Mutsu, Fusou, Yamashiro and 2 additional ships to [W4-2]. S-Rank the boss node 2 times.

260.name: Rush the Battleship Force into the Northern Sea!
260.desc: Sortie 2 (F)BB (no BBV), 1 CVL and 3 additional ships to [W3-5]. S-Rank the boss node.
260.memo:
✘You cannot use any additional CV(L).
➣Rewards a Type 1 AP Shell

262.name: Advance the Nishimura Fleet into the Southern Sea!
262.desc: Sortie Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, Shigure, Michishio and 1 additional ship to [W5-1]. S-Rank the boss node.

263.name: Sortie the 6th Cruiser Division into the Southwestern Sea!
263.desc: Sortie Furutaka, Kako, Aoba, Kinugasa and 2 additional ships to [W2-5]. S-Rank the boss node.

267.name: Sortie the 11th Destroyer Division!
267.desc: Sortie Fubuki, Shirayuki, Hatsuyuki, Murakumo and 2 additional ships to [W2-3]. B-Rank+ the boss node.

268.name: The 11th Destroyer Division's Anti-Submarine Patrol!
268.desc: Sortie Fubuki, Shirayuki, Hatsuyuki and Murakumo to [W1-5]. C-Rank+ the boss node.

269.name: Sortie the 21st Destroyer Division!
269.desc: Sortie Hatsuharu, Nenohi, Wakaba, Hatsushimo and 2 additional ships to [W3-1]. S-Rank the boss node.

270.name: Sortie the 22nd Destroyer Division!
270.desc: Sortie Satsuki, Fumizuki, Nagatsuki, 1 DD and up to 2 additional ships to [W1-4]. S-Rank the boss node.

271.name: The Nachi Division Sets Sail!
271.desc: Sortie Nachi as flagship, Hatsushimo, Kasumi, Ushio, Akebono and 1 additional ship to [W2-2]. S-Rank the boss node.

272.name: Sortie the Remodeled Anti-Air Heavy Cruiser!
272.desc: Sortie Maya Kai or Kai Ni, 1 CL, 2 DD and up to 2 additional ships to [W2-3]. S-Rank the boss node.
272.memo: ➣Rewards a 25mm Triple Autocannon Mount and a Type 3 Shell

273.name: Sortie the New Mikawa Fleet into the Solomon Islands Region!
273.desc: Sortie Choukai Kai Ni as flagship and any five of Aoba, Kinugasa, Kako, Furutaka, Tenryuu, Yuubari to [W5-1]. S-Rank the boss node.

274.name: The 6th Destroyer Division's Anti-Submarine Patrol, Nanodesu!
274.desc: Sortie Akatsuki, Hibiki/Verniy, Inazuma and Ikazuchi to [W1-5]. C-Rank+ the boss node.

275.name: The 18th Division Sets Sail!
275.desc: Sortie Tenryuu, Tatsuta and at least 2 other ships to [W2-3]. S-Rank the boss node.

276.name: Advance the Surface Breakthrough Force!
276.desc: Sortie Hiei, Kirishima, Nagara, Akatsuki, Ikazuchi and Inazuma to [W5-1]. S-Rank the boss node.

277.name: DesDiv 6's Thorough Anti-Submarine Patrol, Nanodesu!
277.desc: Sortie Akatsuki Kai Ni, Hibiki/Verniy, Ikazuchi and Inazuma to [W1-5]. B-Rank+ the boss node.
277.memo: ➣Rewards 2 Screws and a Type 93 Passive SONAR

278.name: Rush the 1st Torpedo Squadron to Operation KE!
278.desc: Sortie Abukuma as flagship, Hibiki/Verniy, Hatsushimo, Wakaba, Samidare and Shimakaze to [W3-2]. B-Rank+ the boss node.

279.name: Rush the 1st Torpedo Squadron North Again to Operation KE!
279.desc: Sortie Abukuma Kai Ni as flagship, Hibiki/Verniy, Yuugumo, Naganami, Akigumo and Shimakaze to [W3-2]. S-Rank the boss node.

285.name: Advance the Carrier Task Force into the Northern Sea!
285.desc: Sortie a CV as flagship to [W3-5]. S-Rank the boss node.

286.name: Intensify the Anti-Sub Patrol in Front of the Naval Base!
286.desc: Sortie to [W1-5]. A-Rank+ the boss node 4 times.

287.name: Sortie the 5th Carrier Division into the Coral Sea Region!
287.desc: Sortie Shoukaku, Zuikaku, Oboro, Akigumo and up to 2 additional ships to [W5-2]. S-Rank the boss node.

288.name: Sortie the New 21st Cruiser Division into the North!
288.desc: Sortie Nachi Kai Ni, Ashigara Kai Ni, Tama, Kiso and up to 2 additional ships to [W3-1]. S-Rank the boss node.

289.name: Sortie the 16th Cruiser Division (First Generation)!
289.desc: Sortie Ashigara as flagship, Kuma, Nagara and up to 3 additional ships to [W2-2]. S-Rank the boss the node.

293.name: Sortie CarDiv 3 to the Nansei Islands Defense Line!
293.desc: Sortie Zuikaku Kai as flagship, Zuihou, Chitose (CVL), Chiyoda (CVL) and up to 2 additional ships to [W1-4]. S-Rank the boss node.

294.name: Sortie the Ozawa Fleet!
294.desc: Sortie Zuikaku Kai+ as flagship, Zuihou Kai, Chitose (CVL), Chiyoda (CVL), Ise Kai and Hyuuga Kai to [W2-4]. S-Rank the boss node.
294.memo: ➣Rewards a Zero Fighter Model 52C (601 Air Group)

295.name: Sortie the 16th Cruiser Division (Second Generation)!
295.desc: Sortie Natori as flagship, Isuzu, Kinu and up to 3 additional ships to [W2-3]. S-Rank the boss node.

296.name: Newly Formed Carrier Division, Advance into the North!
296.desc: Sortie 2 CV, 2 BBV/CAV and 2 DD to [W3-3]. S-Rank the boss node.

297.name: Carry out the Operation Rei-Go!
297.desc: Sortie Kasumi as flagship, Ashigara, Ooyodo, Asashimo, Kiyoshimo and 1 additional ship to [W2-5]. S-Rank the boss node.

805.name: Send Flagship Kasumi to Patrol the Northern Sea!
805.desc: Sortie Kasumi Kai Ni as flagship, 3 DD and up to 2 additional ships to [W3-1]. B-Rank+ the boss node.

806.name: Flagship Kasumi, Sortie! Annhilate the Enemy Fleet!
806.desc: Sortie Kasumi Kai Ni as flagship, 2 DD and up to 3 additional ships to [W2-5]. S-Rank the boss node.
806.memo: ➣Rewards 3 Screws and a 25mm Triple Autocannon Mount (Concentrated Deployment)

807.name: Sortie the 31st Cruiser Division!
807.desc: Sortie Isuzu Kai Ni as flagship, Satsuki Kai Ni, Uzuki Kai and up to 3 additional ships to [W1-6]. Reach node N.

808.name: Sortie the 27th Destroyer Division!
808.desc: Sortie Shiratsuyu Kai as flagship, Shigure, Harusame, Samidare and up to 2 additional ships to [W2-3]. S-Rank the boss node.

809.name: Enhance the Strength of Landing Force Operations!
809.desc: Sortie to [W6-3]. B-Rank+ the boss node.
809.memo: ➣Rewards 3 Screws and a Daihatsu Landing Craft

810.name: Defend the Refinery Area!
810.desc: Sortie a CL and 5 DD to [W1-3]. S-Rank the boss node 3 times.

811.name: Reinforce the Nansei Islands Defense Line!
811.desc: Sortie to [W1-4]. S-Rank the boss node 5 times.

812.name: Secure Control of the Orel Sea!
812.desc: Sortie Ooshio as flagship to [W2-3]. S-Rank the boss node 6 times.

813.name: Sortie the flagship Ooshio!
813.desc: Sortie Ooshio Kai Ni as flagship to [W3-5]. S-Rank the boss node.

814.name: High-Speed Transport Enforcement Unit, Sortie!
814.desc: Sortie Sendai Kai Ni, Kawakaze Kai Ni, Shigure Kai Ni, 2 DD and up to 1 additional ship to [W4-1]. A-Rank+ the boss node.

815.name: Send the 1st Carrier Division into the West!
815.desc: Sortie Akagi as flagship, Kaga and up to 4 additional ships to [W4-5]. S-Rank the boss node.
815.memo: ➣Rewards 3 Screws and a Skilled Crew Member

816.name: The Fleet's Third Anniversary!
816.desc: Sortie to [W2-2] and [W2-3]. S-Rank the boss nodes of both maps.

817.name: New Fleet, Hurry to the Nansei Islands Defense Line!
817.desc: Sortie a CL/CLT/CT flagship, 4 DD, and up to 1 additional ship to [W1-4]. A-Rank+ the boss node.

818.name: Solidify and Maintain the Safety of the Base's Local Routes!
818.desc: Sortie a CL flagship, 4 DD and up to 1 additional ship to [W1-6]. Reach node N.

819.name: The 31st Cruiser Division's Anti-Submarine Suppression!
819.desc: Sortie Isuzu Kai Ni as flagship, Satsuki Kai Ni, Uzuki Kai and 3 additional ships to [W1-6]. Reach node N twice.
819.memo: ➣Rewards 2 Screws and a Type 3 Active Sonar

820.name: Sortie the New 8th Destroyer Division!
820.desc: Sortie Asashio Kai Ni+ as flagship, Michishio, Ooshio, Arashio and 2 additional ships to [W1-6]. Reach node N.
820.memo: ➣Rewards a Searchlight and a Daihatsu Landing Craft

821.name: The Elite 8th Destroyer Division's Anti-Submarine Patrol!
821.desc: Sortie a fleet that includes Asashio Kai Ni D and Ooshio Kai Ni to [W1-5]. S-Rank the boss node 2 times.
821.memo: ➣Rewards 4 Screws and a Type 4 Passive Sonar

823.name: Torpedo Squadron, Persist on the Southwest Defense Line!
823.desc: Sortie a CL/CLT/CT as flagship, 4 DD and 1 additional ship to [W1-4]. A-Rank the boss node 2 times.
823.memo: ※Torpedo Squadron, Repeatedly Sortie to the Southwestern Defense Line!

824.name: Carry Out a Patrol of the Coastal Refinery Area!
824.desc: Sortie a CVL as flagship, 3 DD and 2 additional ships to [W1-3]. S-Rank the boss node.

825.name: Torpedo Squadron, Patrol the Nansei Islands Region!
825.desc: Sortie a CL/CLT/CT as flagship, 4 DD and 1 additional ship to [W2-2] and [W2-3]. S-Rank the boss nodes of both maps.

826.name: Sortie the 19th Destroyer Division!
826.desc: Sortie Isonami, Uranami, Ayanami and Shikinami to [W1-5]. A-Rank+ the boss node.

827.name: Rush DesDiv 19 to Engage the Enemy's Main Forces!
827.desc: Sortie Isonami, Uranami, Ayanami and Shikinami and up to 2 additional ships to [W2-5]. A-Rank+ the boss node.

828.name: Carry Out Preparations for the Airfield Construction!
828.desc: Sortie to [W6-3]. S-Rank the boss node.

829.name: Rush into the Night! Strike at the Enemy Landing Force!
829.desc: Sortie to [W5-3]. A-Rank+ the boss node.

830.name: Acquire the Light that Illuminates the Night Sea!
830.desc: Sortie to [W2-1]. S-Rank the boss node.

831.name: Saury Fishing: Light it Up! Saury Fishing Aid!
831.desc: Have 3 sauries in your inventory. They can be farmed from [W1], [W3], and [W6].

832.name: Saury Fishing: More, More! Keep Fishing for Saury!
832.desc: Have 8 sauries in your inventory. They can be farmed from [W1], [W3], and [W6]. You will be prompted to pick a reward, so do your research beforehand.

833.name: Saury Fishing: Bleeding Edge Saury Fishing! Keep Going!
833.desc: Have 24 sauries in your inventory. They can be farmed from [W1], [W3], and [W6]. You will be prompted to pick a reward, so do your research beforehand.

834.name: Reinforce the Nansei Islands Defense Line!
834.desc: Sortie an AV or CAV as flagship to [W1-4]. S-Rank the boss node.

835.name: Sortie the 16th Cruiser Division (Third Generation)!
835.desc: Sortie Kinu, Aoba, Kitakami, Ooi and up to 2 additional ships to [W2-4]. A-Rank+ the boss node.

836.name: Break Through With the Elite 16th Cruiser Division!
836.desc: Sortie Kinu Kai Ni as flagship and any five of Kitakami Kai Ni, Ooi Kai Ni, Kuma Kai, Aoba Kai, Uranami Kai and Shikinami Kai to [W2-5]. S-Rank the boss node.

837.name: Succeed in the Transport Operation and Return!
837.desc: Sortie Kinu Kai Ni as flagship, Uranami Kai, 3 DD and one additional non-DD to [W2-2]. S-Rank the boss node.

838.name: Heavy Cruiser Division, Set Sail!
838.desc: Sortie a CA(V) as flagship, 3 other CA(V) and up to 2 additional ships to [W2-3]. S-Rank the boss node.

839.name: Sortie a Battleship Division!
839.desc: Sortie a (F)BB(V) as flagship, 1 other (F)BB(V) and up to 4 additional ships to [W3-3]. S-Rank the boss node. You will have to select a reward. Press F10 to clear the overlay.
839.memo: ➣Rewards 2 Screws and either a Type 2 Seaplane Fighter Kai OR a PBY-5A Catalina

840.name: Special Winter Mission: Elite Destroyer Division, Sortie!
840.desc: Sortie 4 DD ONLY to [W1-1] and [W1-2]. S-Rank the boss nodes of both maps. You will be prompted to select one of two rewards, so be careful. Press F10 to clear the overlay.
840.memo: ➣Rewards a Furniture Fairy and either a ★+3 25mm Triple Autocannon Mount OR an Anti-Torpedo Bulge (Large)

841.name: Special Winter Mission: Seaplane Tender, Set Sail!
841.desc: Sortie an AV as flagship, 3 DD and up to 2 other ships to [W1-3] and [W1-4]. S-Rank the boss nodes of both maps.

801.name: Happy New Year! The Torpedo Squadron Starts the Sortie!
801.desc: Sortie a CL as flagship and 1-5 DD to [W1-2], [W1-3] and [W1-4]. S-Rank the boss nodes of each map.

802.name: New Year's Irako Support!
802.desc: Sortie an AV, AS or DD as flagship and up to 5 other ships to [W2-3]. S-Rank the boss node 3 times.

803.name: The Time Has Come! The Aviation Ships' New Year!
803.desc: Sortie a BBV as flagship, 1 other BBV, 2 CAV and up to 2 other ships to [W4-2]. S-Rank the boss node 3 times. You will have to select a reward. Press F10 to clear the overlay.
803.memo: ➣Rewards 3 Screws, a Furniture Fairy and ONLY ONE OF a Shiun OR an Ro.43 Reconnaissance Seaplane OR an OS2U

804.name: New Year's Greeting! The Carrier Task Force Commences the Sortie!
804.desc: Sortie a CV as flagship, 2 DD, and 3 other ships to [W3-5]. S-Rank the boss node 3 times.

201.name: Daily Victory
201.desc: Defeat an abyssal fleet by obtaining at least a B-Rank.

226.name: Daily [W2] Bosses
226.desc: Sortie to any map in [W2]. B-Rank+ any boss node 5 times.
226.memo: ※Seize Control of the Nansei Islands Region!

214.name: Weekly Sorties
214.desc: Sortie 36 times, reach 24 boss nodes, B-Rank+ 12 boss nodes, and obtain 6 S-Ranks.

229.name: Weekly [W4] Bosses
229.desc: Sortie to any map in [W4]. B-Rank+ any boss node 12 times.

241.name: Weekly [W3] Bosses
241.desc: Sortie to [W3-3], [W3-4] or [W3-5]. B-Rank+ any boss node 5 times.
241.memo:
※Destroy the Enemy Fleet's Main Forces to the North!
➣Rewards 3 Screws

242.name: Weekly [W4-4]
242.desc: Sortie to [W4-4]. B-Rank+ the boss node.
242.memo: ※Crush the Backbone of the Enemy's Eastern Fleet!

243.name: Weekly [W5-2]
243.desc: Sortie to [W5-2]. S-Rank the boss node 2 times.
243.memo:
※Obtain Air Superiority Over the Southern Coral Sea Islands Region!
➣Rewards 2 Screws

261.name: Weekly [W1-5]
261.desc: Sortie to [W1-5]. A-Rank+ the boss node 3 times.
261.memo:
※Strive to Maintain the Security of the Naval Convoy Route!
➣Rewards 3 Screws

249.name: Monthly [W2-5] Myoukou Fleet
249.desc: Sortie Myoukou, Nachi, Haguro and 3 additional ships to [W2-5]. S-Rank the boss node.

256.name: Monthly [W6-1]
256.desc: Sortie to [W6-1]. S-Rank the boss node 3 times.

257.name: Monthly [W1-4]
257.desc: Sortie a CL as flagship, 0-2 other CL and 3-5 DD to [W1-4]. S-Rank the boss node.

259.name: Monthly [W5-1]
259.desc: Sortie 3 BB (Yamato-class, Nagato-class, Ise-class or Fusou-class ONLY), 1 CL and 2 additional ships to [W5-1]. S-Rank the boss node.
259.memo:
※Send a Surface Task Force Southward!
➣Rewards 4 Screws

265.name: Monthly [W1-5]
265.desc: Sortie to [W1-5]. A-Rank+ the boss node 10 times.
265.memo:
※Month-Long Reinforcement of the Naval Convoy
➣Rewards 3 Screws

264.name: Monthly [W4-2]
264.desc: Sortie 2 CV(L), 2 DD and 2 additional ships to [W4-2]. S-Rank the boss node.
264.memo:
※Send a Carrier Task Force Westward!
➣Rewards 2 Screws

266.name: Monthly [W2-5] Nightmare Party
266.desc: Sortie a DD as flagship, 3 additional DD, 1 CA (not CAV) and 1 CL to [W2-5]. S-Rank the boss node.
266.memo:
※Break Through With the Surface Counterattack Force!
➣Rewards 2 Screws

822.name: Quarterly [W2-4]
822.desc: Sortie to [W2-4]. S-Rank the boss node 2 times.

301.name: The First Exercise!
301.desc: Challenge another fleet in an Exercise.

304.name: Daily Exercises 2
304.desc: Secure 5 victories in Exercises within the same day.

302.name: Weekly Exercises
302.desc: Secure 20 victories in Exercises within the same week.

306.name: Preparation for the Ceremony (Part 2)
306.desc: Show your love by securing 2 victories in Exercises.

307.name: Endeavor to Improve the Fleet's Level of Training!
307.desc: Secure 3 victories in Exercises within the same day.

308.name: Intensify the Exercises!
308.desc: Secure 4 victories in Exercises within the same day.
308.memo:
※Intensify the Exercises; Endeavor to Improve the Fleet's Level of Training!
➣Rewards a Screw

309.name: Training for the Next Operation!
309.desc: Secure 4 victories in Exercises within the same day.
309.memo:
※Prepare Another Breakthrough into the North; Endeavor to Improve the Fleet's Level of Training!
➣Rewards a Screw

311.name: Monthly Exercises
311.desc: Secure 7 victories in Exercises within the same day.

312.name: Landing Force Exercises
312.desc: Secure 4 victories in Exercises within the same day.

313.name: Mass Exercises for Fall
313.desc: Secure 8 victories in Exercises within the same day.

314.name: Mass Exercises for Winter
314.desc: Secure 8 victories in Exercises within the same day.

402.name: Daily Expeditions 1
402.desc: Complete 3 successful expeditions within the same day.

403.name: Daily Expeditions 2
403.desc: Complete 10 successful expeditions within the same day.

404.name: Weekly Expeditions
404.desc: Complete 30 successful expeditions within the same week.

408.name: Operation to Acquire Foreign Technology!
408.memo:
※Operation to Acquire Technology via Continued Submarine Dispatch Operations!
➣Rewards a Ju 87C Kai and a Furniture Fairy

409.name: Operation to Contact a Foreign Ship!
409.memo:
※Operation to Contact a Foreign Ship via Continued Submarine Dispatches
➣Rewards the DD Z1; enables Z3 and Bismarck construction

412.name: Enhance the Effectiveness of Aviation Firepower!

411.name: Weekly Tokyo Express 2
411.desc: Complete Expedition 37 or 38 six more times within the same week.
411.memo:
※Continue to Carry Out Southern Tokyo Express Operations!
➣Rewards a Screw

413.name: Enhance the Effectiveness of Aviation Firepower! (Cont.)

414.name: Carry Out the Deep Sea Submarine Operation!
414.memo: ➣Rewards a 53cm Submarine Bow Torpedo Mount (8 tubes)

415.name: Extend the Benefits of the Deep Sea Submarine Operation!
415.memo: ➣Rewards a 53cm Submarine Bow Torpedo Mount (8 tubes)

417.name: Carry Out the Decoy Task Force Support Operation!

419.name: Execute the Naval Review!
419.memo: ➣Rewards a Screw and a Headquarters Personnel

420.name: Enhance the Effectiveness of the Task Force!

422.name: Submarine Dispatch Operation to Acquire Aircraft Technology

423.name: Submarine Dispatch Operation to Acquire Jet Engine Technology
423.desc: Have 5000 steel and 1500 bauxite. Complete Expeditions 30 and 31.

605.name: Daily Development 1
605.desc: Attempt to construct a piece of equipment. Failures count toward this.

607.name: Daily Development 2
607.desc: Attempt to construct 3 pieces of equipment. Failures count toward this.

608.name: Daily Construction 2
608.memo: ※Enhance the Fleet by Constructing Ship Girls!

619.name: Daily Upgrade
619.desc: Upgrade a piece of equipment using Akashi's Improvement Arsenal.

611.name: Preparation for the Ceremony! (Part 1)
611.desc: Scrap 2 pieces of equipment to show your love!

613.name: Weekly Dismantlement
613.desc: Scrap 24 pieces of equipment. Scrap them one at a time.

614.name: Model Conversion: Tomonoga
614.desc: Set a CV(L) as secretary. Equip her with a Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Tomonaga Squadron). Scrap two Tenzan.
614.memo:
✘Consumes the equipment. Make sure the equipped plane is unlocked!
➣Rewards a Tenzan Model 12 (Tomonaga Squadron)

615.name: Model Conversion: Egusa
615.desc: Set a CV(L) as secretary. Equip her with a Type 99 Dive Bomber (Egusa Squadron). Scrap two Suisei.
615.memo:
✘Consumes the equipment. Make sure the equipped plane is unlocked!
➣Rewards a Suisei (Egusa Squadron)

616.name: Model Conversion: 601 Air Group
616.desc: Set a CV(L) as secretary. Equip her with a Zero Fighter Type 52 Type C (601 Air Group). Scrap two Reppuu.
616.memo:
✘Consumes the equipment. Make sure the equipped plane is unlocked!
➣Rewards a Reppuu (601 Air Group)

618.name: The First Equipment Modernization!
618.desc: Upgrade a piece of equipment using Akashi's Improvement Arsenal.

622.name: Model Conversion: Murata
622.desc: Set Shoukaku as secretary. Equip her with a Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Murata Squadron). Scrap two Tenzan.
622.memo:
✘Consumes the equipment. Make sure the equipped plane is unlocked!
➣Rewards a Tenzan Model 12 (Murata Squadron)

623.name: Form the Elite Type 97 Torpedo Bomber Force: Murata
623.desc: Set Shoukaku or Akagi as secretary. Scrap three Type 97 Torpedo Bombers.

626.name: Monthly Type 0 Fighter Model 21 (Skilled)
626.desc: Have a Skilled Crew Member. Set Houshou as secretary. Equip her with a >> Type 0 Fighter Model 21. Scrap two Type 0 Fighter Model 21s and a Type 96 Fighter.
626.memo:
※The Newly Formed Elite Fighter Squadron
✘Consumes the equipment. Make sure the equipped plane is unlocked!
➣Rewards a Type 0 Fighter Model 21 (Skilled)

627.name: Model Conversion: Type 0 Fighter Model 52 (Skilled)
627.desc: Set a CV as secretary. Equip her with a Type 0 Fighter Model 21 (Skilled). Scrap two Type 0 Fighter Model 52s.
627.memo:
✘Consumes the equipment. Make sure the equipped plane is unlocked!
➣Rewards a Type 0 Fighter Model 52 (Skilled)

628.name: Monthly Type 0 Fighter Model 52 (Skilled)
628.desc: Set a CV as secretary. Equip her with a >> Type 0 Fighter Model 21 (Skilled). Scrap two Type 0 Fighter Model 52s.
628.memo:
※Model Conversion
✘Consumes the equipment. Make sure the equipped plane is unlocked!
➣Rewards a Type 0 Fighter Model 52 (Skilled)

629.name: Reform the Fighter Squadron: Iwai
629.desc: Set Zuikaku as secretary. Equip her with a >> Type 0 Fighter Model 52 (Skilled). Scrap a Zero Fighter Model 52C (601 Air Group).
629.memo:
✘Consumes the equipment. Make sure the equipped plane is unlocked!
➣Rewards a Zero Fighter Model 52C (w/ Iwai Flight)

630.name: Reform the Fighter Squadron: Iwamoto
630.desc: Set Zuikaku as secretary. Equip her with a >> Type 0 Fighter Model 21 (Skilled). Scrap two Type 0 Fighter Model 21s.
630.memo:
✘Consumes the equipment. Make sure the equipped plane is unlocked!
➣Rewards a Zero Fighter Model 21 (w/ Iwamoto Flight)

631.name: Model Conversion and Unit Restructuring: Iwai
631.desc: ☣CAUTION☣ Set Zuikaku as secretary. Equip her with a >> Zero Fighter Model 52C (w/ Iwai Flight). Scrap two Type 0 Fighter Model 62s (Fighter-bomber).
631.memo:
✘Please do your research to determine whether this quest is beneficial for your fleet.
✘Consumes the equipment. Make sure the equipped plane is unlocked!
➣Rewards a Zero Fighter Model 62 (Fighter-bomber / Iwai Squadron)

632.name: Model Conversion: Iwamoto
632.desc: Set Zuikaku as secretary. Equip her with a >> Zero Fighter Model 21 (w/ Iwamoto Flight). Scrap two Type 0 Fighter Model 52.
632.memo:
✘Consumes the equipment. Make sure the equipped plane is unlocked!
➣Rewards a Zero Fighter Model 52A (w/ Iwamoto Flight)

633.name: Model Conversion and Unit Restructuring: Iwamoto
633.desc: Set Zuikaku as secretary. Equip her with a >> Zero Fighter Model 52A (w/ Iwamoto Flight). Scrap two Saiun.
633.memo:
✘Consumes the equipment. Make sure the equipped plane is unlocked!
➣Rewards a Type 0 Fighter Model 53 (Iwamoto Squadron)

636.name: New Equipment Procurement for the Landing Operation
636.desc: Scrap two 7.7mm Machine Guns and two 12.7mm Single Machine Gun Mounts.
636.memo: ➣Rewards a Special Type 2 Amphibious Landing Craft

638.name: Weekly Scrap AA Guns
638.desc: Scrap 6 anti-air guns. High-angle guns do not count.
638.memo:
※Anti-Air Machine Gun Mass Production
➣Rewards a Screw

637.name: Quarterly Skilled Crew Member Training
637.desc: Have 2 Medals. Set Houshou as secretary. Equip her with a >> ★max Type 96 Fighter.
637.memo:
✘Consumes 2 Medals and the equipment. Make sure the equipped plane is unlocked!
➣Rewards 4 Screws and a Skilled Crew Member

639.name: Development of a New Torpedo Armament
639.desc: Have 2 Medals. Set Shimakaze as secretary. Equip her with a ★max 61cm Quintuple Oxygen Torpedo Mount and a ★max 61cm Triple Oxygen Torpedo Mount.
639.memo:
✘Consumes 2 Medals and the equipment. Make sure the equipped torpedoes are unlocked!
➣Rewards 6 Screws and a Prototype 61cm Sextuple (Oxygen) Torpedo Mount

641.name: Advance Preparation for the Airbase Construction
641.desc: Have two Type 96 Fighters and two 7.7mm Machine Guns in your inventory. Scrap two Drum Canisters.
641.memo:
✘Consumes the equipment. Make sure the equipment is unlocked!
➣Rewards a Type 96 Land-based Attack Aircraft

642.name: Expansion of the Attack Aircraft Squadron
642.desc: Have two Type 99 Dive Bombers and two 7.7mm Machine Guns in your inventory.
642.memo:
✘Consumes the equipment. Make sure the equipment is unlocked!
➣Rewards a Type 96 Land-based Attack Aircraft

643.name: Quarterly Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft
643.desc: Have one Type 96 Land-based Attack Aircraft and two Type 97 Torpedo Bombers in your inventory. Scrap two Type 0 Fighter Model 21s.
643.memo:
※Procurement of the Mainstay Attack Aircraft
✘Consumes the equipment. Make sure the equipment is unlocked!
➣Rewards a Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft

644.name: Procurement for an Improved Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft
644.desc: Have one Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft and two Tenzan in your inventory.
644.memo:
※Procurement for the Improved-Performance Model of Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft
✘Consumes the equipment. Make sure the equipment is unlocked!
➣Rewards a Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft Model 22A

645.name: Monthly Underway Replenishment
645.desc: Have 750 fuel, 750 ammo, two Drum Canisters and one Type 91 AP Shell in your inventory. Scrap one Type 3 Shell.
645.memo:
※Materials Procurement for Underway Replenishment
✘Consumes the equipment and resources. Make sure the equipment is unlocked!
➣Rewards an Underway Replenishment

646.name: Procurement for Custom-Made Furniture
646.desc: Have 5000 Furniture Coins, two 25mm Twin AC Mounts and two 25mm Triple AC Mounts in your inventory. Scrap one 25mm Single AC Mount.
646.memo:
✘Consumes the items. Make sure the equipment is unlocked!
➣Rewards a Furniture Fairy

647.name: Deploy an Air Base Squadron to the Chubu Region!
647.desc: Have 1200 fuel, 3000 bauxite, and one Construction Battalion in your inventory. Scrap two Drum Canisters.
647.memo:
✘Consumes the items and resources.
➣Enables a Land Airbase in [W6]

648.name: Procurement for Custom-Made Furniture
648.desc: Have 5000 Furniture Coins, two 14cm Single Gun Mounts and two 15.2cm Single Gun Mounts in your inventory. Scrap two 12.7cm Twin High-Angle Gun Mounts.
648.memo:
✘Consumes the equipment and resources. Make sure the equipment is unlocked!
➣Rewards a Furniture Fairy

649.name: Development of a New Axis Reconnaissance Aircraft
649.desc: Have one Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft and two Saiun. Scrap two Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplanes.
649.memo:
✘Consumes the equipment. Make sure the equipment is unlocked!
➣Rewards a Prototype Keiun (Carrier-based Reconnaissance Model)

650.name: Development of a Jet Fighter-Bomber
650.desc: Have two New Model Aircraft Blueprints and one Ne-Type Engine. Scrap three Shiden Kai Ni.

651.name: Increased Production of the Ne-Type Engine
651.desc: Have 8000 steel, two Ryuusei and two Reppuu. Scrap three Type 0 Fighter Model 52s.
651.memo:
✘Consumes the resources and equipment. Make sure the equipment is unlocked!
➣Rewards a Ne-Type Engine

702.name: Daily Modernization
702.desc: Complete 2 successful modernizations within the same day.

703.name: Weekly Modernization
703.desc: Complete 15 successful modernizations within the same week.
703.memo: ※Proceed With Modernizations to Prepare for War!

705.name: Flight Rigging Modernization
705.desc: Have 5500 steel and 2500 bauxite. Modernize a CV using 5 CV(L) twice.
705.memo:
✘Consumes the resources.
➣Rewards a New Model Aircraft Blueprint
